item.description: General Mathematics Existence proof [2021-09-27 Mon 20:43] One kind of the importance theorem in mathematics is the existence theorem which states something with certain property exists. Basically, there are two kinds of proof of the existence theorem. Construction. E.g. existence of smooth but not differentiable function. Proof by contradiction.
